definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: gravel (as divided, comminuted; Aram. [[חֲחִיחָא]], h.s.os.o0)—only abs. ´[[ח]] Pr 20:17, La 3:16 [[[חֲחָחֶיךָ]] Ps 77:18 v. [[חֵץ]]].—´[[יְמַלֵּא־פִיהוּ ח]] Pr 20:17 fig. of a liar; [[שִׁנׇּ֑י]] ´[[וַיַּגְרֵס בח]] La 3:16 and he hath crushed my teeth with gravel-stones, fig. of ´[[י]]'s dealings with sufferer.
